item.title: CVE-2024-20028|2024-03-04T02:43:40.370Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6739, MT6757, MT6761, MT6763, MT6765, MT6768, MT6771, MT6779, MT6785, MT6833, MT6853, MT6873, MT6877, MT6885, MT6893, MT8163, MT8167, MT8168, MT8512
item.description: In da, there is a possible out of bounds write due to lack of valudation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08541632; Issue ID: ALPS08541687.
